data.title: Johnston Design Group
data.meta_description: Phillip Hale is an architectural draftsman for Johnston Design Group and works primarily on our residential projects.
data.text:
Phillip Hale

Architectural Technician

Phillip Hale is an architectural technician and works primarily on our residential projects. He started doing carpentry thirty years ago and began working in AutoCAD in 1991.

He studied at Technical College of the Lowcountry and obtained his residential builder’s license in 2016. Phillip’s skills with REVIT, combined with his field experience, make him a critical part of the way we make designs come to life.
